title: Learning Python Fast
author: A. Gupta
description: A quick and immersive guide to Python for beginners. Covers all the fundamental concepts with practical examples to get you coding immediately.

title: Accessible Web Design
author: M. Rao
description: Learn how to build beautiful websites that are usable by everyone, including people with disabilities. A crucial skill for modern web developers.

title: Data Structures in JS
author: K. Singh
description: An in-depth look at implementing common data structures like linked lists, stacks, queues, and trees using JavaScript.

title: Intro to Databases
author: N. Sharma
description: A comprehensive introduction to relational databases, SQL, and data modeling. Perfect for aspiring back-end developers.

title: Clean Frontend Architecture
author: R. Iyer
description: Discover patterns and principles for writing scalable and maintainable frontend code. Essential for large-scale projects.

title: Machine Learning Notes
author: S. Verma
description: A concise collection of notes and code snippets covering the most important algorithms and concepts in Machine Learning.

title: Effective Git
author: T. Mehta
description: Master version control with Git. This book goes beyond the basics to teach you workflows and advanced commands.

title: Design Systems 101
author: P. Kaur
description: Learn how to create and maintain a design system to ensure consistency and speed up development across teams.

title: Networking Basics
author: H. Ali
description: Understand the fundamentals of how the internet works, from IP addresses to DNS and HTTP. A must-read for any developer.

title: Practical Linux
author: Z. Khan
description: Become proficient with the Linux command line. This book covers essential commands, shell scripting, and system administration.
